variants.Description in input context: c.208G>A (p.G70D) variant in DJ-1 associated with Parkinson's disease

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells expressing wild-type and mutant DJ-1 were used for immunoprecipitation experiments.

Readout description.Result Description: The p.G70D variant showed reduced interaction with parkin compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Interaction with parkin greater than 70% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Interaction with parkin less than 40% compared to wild-type.
